page.title: 16WESTCROFT SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: A large demand for leisure is met by the Westcroft Centre, only a 15 min. walk from Wallington High St, whose activities include the following: aerobics, archery, badminton, cricket, basketball, circuit training,disco/jazz dancing, fencing, exercise dance, keep fit, 5-a-side football, golf practice, tennis, table-tennis,gymnastics, short tennis, squash, table squash, swimming, karate, kendo, self-defence,trampoline, volleyball, yoga, korfball, lacrosse, netball, pop mobility and racquetball. Swimming lessons are available for all ages, and there is a fun programme for children on Saturdays. Also on Sat- urdays from 1100-1400 and 1700-1800, a large inflatable dragon is inflated in the pool for the children. As demand for an even wider area of activities increases, the leisure centre will cope with it.
